meanings.definition: A person who leads or guides a group of workers.
meanings.sent1: The leadman showed the new employees how to do their tasks.
meanings.sent2: The leadman organized the team to work efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The leadman joked with the workers to keep their spirits up.
meanings.sent4: The leadman was the captain of the work ship, steering everyone in the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The leadman's presence on the site was like a lighthouse, guiding everyone safely.

meanings.definition: The person in charge of a particular task or project.
meanings.sent1: Our leadman for the construction project is experienced and reliable.
meanings.sent2: The leadman made sure every detail of the task was completed on time.
meanings.sent3: The leadman's determination to finish the project was inspiring to the team.
meanings.sent4: The leadman was the conductor of the project orchestra, ensuring harmony in every task.
meanings.sent5: The leadman's leadership shone brightly, illuminating the path to success.

meanings.definition: A skilled worker who is responsible for overseeing a team.
meanings.sent1: The leadman's expertise in carpentry made him invaluable to the team.
meanings.sent2: As the leadman, he supervised the workers with precision and care.
meanings.sent3: The leadman's knack for problem-solving saved the day more than once.
meanings.sent4: The leadman was the master chef of the construction crew, cooking up plans for success.
meanings.sent5: The leadman's watchful eye ensured the team's work was top-notch.
